identity.mission: Create a survey platform that feels like a high-stakes fintech game, not a boring form filler.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Gaming excitement.
Emotion First: Every click should feel rewarding (haptic/visual feedback).
Content is King: Data is the hero, but make it look expensive.
Zoom In: Focus on the 'Balance' and 'Reward' moments.
Negative Space: Don't clutter the dashboard; let the numbers breathe.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, API Keys, Code Snippets

typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Do NOT use Inter for headings.

primary.name: Emerald Cash
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Success States, Money Indicators

rules: Dark mode cards must have a 1px border: border-white/10.
Light mode cards must have a subtle shadow: shadow-sm or shadow-md.
Text on dark backgrounds must be slate-200 or slate-400, never pure white unless it's a heading.

dashboard.rules: Every pixel utilized. Use h-full on children.

landing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Leave breathing room.

spacing.scale: 2x standard. Use p-8 where you'd normally use p-4.

styling_rules.buttons: Rounded-full for primary actions. Sharp corners (rounded-md) for secondary.
styling_rules.cards: Glassmorphism in Dark Mode (bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10). Clean & Solid in Light Mode (bg-white border-slate-200 shadow-sm).
styling_rules.inputs: h-12 for better touch targets. bg-slate-50 (light) or bg-slate-900 (dark).

glassmorphism.classes: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-950/70 border border-white/20 dark:border-white/10

gradients.usage: Subtle background glows, text gradients for emphasis.

types: List Stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 } }}
Number Ticker: Use react-countup for balance updates.

landing_hero.alt: Happy user winning rewards on phone

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-5 h-5 or w-6 h-6).

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Do NOT use pure black backgrounds.
Do NOT center text by default; use left alignment for readability.
ALWAYS add data-testid to interactive elements.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards.
Use 'gap-4' minimum for flex/grid layouts to prevent crowding.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance React app. Follow these guidelines strictly. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Use 'Outfit' for all headings. Ensure the Dark/Light toggle works seamlessly using Tailwind's 'dark' class strategy.
